1.1.0.name: wordpress/ted-virtualsidebar
1.1.0.description:
Ted-VirtualSidebar This plugins will allow you to avoid using 'sidebar.php' in themes, but using as many virtual sidebars as you need. By the same way, you could select a sidebar to specific templates sources pages. I created this plugins because: since the day I began to use Widgets, never I used these famous sidebar files.

So this plugins will allow you to :

  • Avoid 'sidebar.php' in your themes
  • Having as many Sidebar you want
  • Select Sidebars by templates pages

See the page of VirtualSideBar : http://wp.tedac.fr/en/plugins/ted-virtualsidebar/

See also: http://wp.tedac.fr/en/plugins/
